cells.content:
**Notes**

* Added Redis Cloud Connection URL
* Practice Commands

SET message 'Hi there!'
GET message
// GETEX message EX 5 PX 1000 // Will throw error as EX PX cant be set together
GETEX message EX 5
GETEX message PX 1000
SET message 'I am changed' GET
GET message
SET message 'First value' XX
GETEX message EX 1
SET message 'Second value' NX
GETEX message EX 1

MSET CRonaldo 07 Country 'Portugal' Club 'Al-Nassr'
MGET CRonaldo Country Club

DEL Club
DEL Country
DEL CRonaldo

SET CRonaldo 'Portugal_07'
GET CRonaldo 
GETRANGE CRonaldo 0 7
SETRANGE CRonaldo 0 'Al-Nassr'
GET CRonaldo

SET RonAge 39
GET RonAge // Returing String causing storing internally as string
INCR RonAge // Returning Number cause it parsed the value as number first then incremented.
DECR RonAge
INCRBY RonAge 10 
DECRBY RonAge 11 
INCRBYFLOAT RonAge 1.0
